entry.title: DBatLoader - Malware Analysis Walkthrough

Still I wanted to post it so I can show snippet of what I’m doing aaand hopefully soon enough I will finish this analysis and report. entry.title: First post
entry.summary: Welcome to my blog thingy Hi, I’m Qba01. As the text above says welcome. As some may tell I’m not used to posting, I prefer lurking but I decided that it might be a good opportunity to share what I do when I can actually share it. Also I think it might become a good habbit which pushes me to focus more on cyber stuff and allow me to grow my knowledge further. So what I intend to do with this. ...
